  • Method Details

    • browseCatalog

      @GetMapping(value="/browseCatalog", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Course>> browseCatalog()
      Endpoint to browse the course catalog.
      Returns:
      A list of available courses.

    • dropCourse

      @DeleteMapping(value="/dropCourse", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> dropCourse(@RequestParam String username, @RequestParam int courseCode)
      Endpoint to drop a course for a student.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the student.
      courseCode - The course code of the course to be dropped.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • viewGrades

      @GetMapping(value="/viewGrades", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> viewGrades(@RequestParam String username)
      Endpoint to view the grades of a student.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the student.
      Returns:
      A list of grades or an error message if the retrieval fails.

    • accountInfo

      @GetMapping(value="/accountInfo", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> accountInfo(@RequestParam String username)
      Endpoint to get account information of a student.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the student.
      Returns:
      The account information of the student or an error message if the retrieval fails.

    • registerForCourse

      @PostMapping(value="/registerForCourse", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> registerForCourse(@RequestParam String username, @RequestParam List<Integer> primaryCourseCodes, @RequestParam List<Integer> alternateCourseCodes)
      Endpoint to register a student for primary and alternate courses.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the student.
      primaryCourseCodes - A list of primary course codes.
      alternateCourseCodes - A list of alternate course codes.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the result of the registration process.
